entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
